div.head: 1. What or Who it is that is Per≈øecuted.
div.p:

div.head: 3. The Nature of Per≈øecution, or What it is to Per≈øecute.

The fighting, the oppo≈øing of this ≈øpirit again≈øt the other, is Per≈øecution. div.head: 5. The Wayes and Means of Per≈øecution.
div.p: The Wayes and Means of Per≈øecution, are very many. Who can want In≈øtruments to afflict the innocent and helple≈øs, who can neither re≈øi≈øt the evil which is offered them, nor harm that which offers it? (ob≈øerve this by the way and con≈øider it well. What hath been ≈øet up all this night of the Apo≈øtacy, but Images of the true Wor≈øhip? and what compelling hath there been thereto?)
